description: A lymph node located within the lung tissue.

attributes.name: Presence
attributes.description: Indicates whether the intraparenchymal lymph node is present or absent.

values.name: Present
values.description: The intraparenchymal lymph node is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: The intraparenchymal lymph node is absent.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: The status of the intraparenchymal lymph node.

values.name: Stable
values.description: The intraparenchymal lymph node is stable in size.

values.name: New
values.description: A new intraparenchymal lymph node has appeared.

values.name: Enlarged
values.description: The intraparenchymal lymph node has increased in size.

values.name: Decreased in size
values.description: The intraparenchymal lymph node has decreased in size.

values.name: Resolved
values.description: The intraparenchymal lymph node has disappeared.

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: The size of the intraparenchymal lymph node has remained the same.

attributes.name: Distribution
attributes.description: The distribution pattern of the intraparenchymal lymph node.

values.name: Solitary
values.description: There is a single intraparenchymal lymph node.

values.name: Multiple
values.description: There are multiple intraparenchymal lymph nodes.

values.name: Clustered
values.description: The intraparenchymal lymph nodes are clustered together.

attributes.name: Severity
attributes.description: The severity of the intraparenchymal lymph node. Not applicable (N/A) for this finding.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: The location of the intraparenchymal lymph node.

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: The size of the intraparenchymal lymph node.

attributes.name: Associated Findings
attributes.description: Any other findings that are associated with the intraparenchymal lymph node.
